entries.title_d: A freighter that was hired by the Yavin 4 Mining Company is attempting to leave the system without paying its flight tax. Intercept, capture, and escort this vessel back to Imperial hands for questioning.
entries.title: Yavin System: Capture the Illegal Freighter
entries.thanks_5: You have to protect me from Polard.
entries.thanks_3: Listen...as long as you protect me I will tell you everything I know.
entries.thanks_2: I am in so much trouble right now.
entries.thanks_1: There are going to be more.
entries.taunt_5: Polard isn't going to be happy when he hears about this mess.
entries.taunt_4: I have to kill you. It is nothing personal, just business.
entries.taunt_3: We are never going to let him talk.
entries.taunt_2: Imperials should keep their noses out of our business.
entries.taunt_1: So you thought you could just get away did you?
entries.target_disabled: The vessel's engine system is shut down. Move in close and deliver our ultimatium.
entries.recovery_success: The illegal smuggler is back in our hands. If we have anything further for you to do we will inform the Yavin station.
entries.quest_recover_d: Once disabled, move in close to the freighter and a warning will be sent. If the vessel refuses to return to base you will destroy it.
entries.quest_location_d: The ship is still in the Yavin system but it is probably getting ready to jump from the system. Intercept it before it can escape.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the freighter back to the station so that the pilot can be questioned.
entries.quest_disable_d: Intercept and disable the freighter before it can leave the system.
entries.panic_5: They are not going to let me talk. You have to protect me!
entries.panic_4: Blast it! I knew that if I got captured Polard would never let me live.
entries.panic_3: Polard is never going to let me talk.
entries.panic_2: You captured me, now you have to keep me alive!
entries.panic_1: They are going to destroy me rather then let me be captured.
entries.failed_escape: You were supposed to capture that ship, not let it get away.
entries.failed_destroy: You were supposed to capture that ship, not destroy it.
entries.escort_wiped_out: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:\#pcontrast3 < Enemy escort fighters eliminated. >\#pcontrast3 \#pcontrast1
entries.complete: The vessel is in Imperial hands. Return to your normal duties.
entries.capture_started: Capture process beginning. The target vessel will have 30 seconds to comply or be destroyed.
entries.capture_phase_2: Fine, I will follow you. Just don't blow me up.
entries.capture_phase_1: What are you doing? You have no right!
entries.capture_complete: The vessel is under your control. Escort it back for questioning by the Empire authorities.
entries.arrival_phase_2: The location of the illegal vessel has been sent to your nav computer. Intercept and capture that vessel.
entries.arrival_phase_1: We are getting a lock on the illegal vessel. Stand by for coordinates.
entries.abort: You have failed in your duty to the Empire to put a stop to illegal smuggling.
